response.original_title: Haunted Lighthouses of the Great Lakes
response.overview: This video focuses on eleven eerie tales of the supernatural all taking place in lighthouses. The tales involve keepers reluctant to leave their posts, the ghosts of people who died violent or tragic deaths, and even a playful kitten. These stories are told by maritime historians, and are augmented by colorful footage of the lighthouses and their surroundings.
response.title: Haunted Lighthouses of the Great Lakes
